summary: Adds two new followers based on The Goon and Franky from The Goon comics
descriptionHtml:
Adds two new followers based on The Goon and Franky from The Goon comics. i suggest using a mod that lets you have more than one follower so you can use both
heres one i use

Multiple Followers Lite
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=87578317

I plan on adding a quest later to add abit of a story for them so look out for that.
Location(just at the camp before you enter Riverwood)
author: Sh4d0w54
